ai-cp7:1.1_0: “May the Brahmā realm be fully understood
ai-cp7:1.4_0: like the moon on the fifteenth day.
ai-cp7:2.1_0: Then I was released from sacrifice
ai-cp7:4.2_0: having made the goods of the valuable,
ai-cp7:4.3_0: where a great wealth is found
ai-cp7:5.2_0: what is given to others is very fruitful.
ai-cp7:5.4_0: a hundred years there will be.
ai-cp7:6.2_0: give gifts to rebirth in this or that state,
ai-cp7:6.3_0: One who has not gone beyond
ai-cp7:7.1_0: as was the seventh moon, the seventh.
